QuestData.Title: Unbidden Visitors
QuestData.Description: Don' worry, Zen'Taji's not in any trouble. He just been studyin' what happens when the river overflows.$b$bYa see the big tall birds that stand on the riverbank? Zen'Taji thinks they're in trouble. The earthquake and the flood pushed the plainstriders over to this side of the water, but they can't fly back, and they're too scared to swim.$b$bThey'll die if they stay here. Zen'Taji doesn't like violence, but maybe YOU can attack them and scare them over to the other side. Yes?
QuestData.LogDescription: Attack 3 Wayward Plainstriders until they flee toward the Barrens.
QuestData.CompletionText: Just beat on 'em, mon. Trust Zen'Taji, they will run. It is no big thing.
QuestData.RewardText: I love all the little animals, mon. I love the big ones, too. I just hate to see you hurt them like that... but it's for the best.
